alert.note: Alert for Adjuntas; Jayuya; Lares (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 19 at 5:55AM ADT until September 19 at 8:00AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AST THIS MORNING FOR ADJUNTAS, JAYUYA AND LARES COUNTIES... At 455 AM AST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Between 4 and 15 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...1.5 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
